name: Coffee
description: A hot beverage prepared from roasted coffee beans, ground and brewed with hot water.

name: Orange Juice
description: A beverage made from the juice of oranges.

name: Green Tea
description: A type of tea made from unoxidized leaves from the Camellia sinensis plant.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: A warm beverage made with chocolate, milk, and often a sweetener.

name: Lemonade
description: A tart and refreshing beverage made from lemon juice, water, and sugar.

name: Iced Tea
description: Black tea brewed and served cold, often with sugar or other flavorings.

name: Smoothie
description: A thick and blended beverage made from fruits, yogurt, and sometimes milk.

name: Milkshake
description: A thick, cold beverage made by blending ice cream, milk, and sometimes flavorings.

name: Soda
description: A fizzy drink flavored with various syrups and often sweetened.

name: Sports Drink
description: A formulated beverage designed to replenish fluids and electrolytes lost during exercise.

name: Energy Drink
description: A beverage containing stimulants like caffeine, designed to increase energy levels.

name: Fruit Punch
description: A beverage made from a combination of fruit juices or purees, often sweetened.

name: Herbal Tea
description: A beverage made by steeping dried herbs or flowers in hot water.

name: Apple Cider
description: A non-alcoholic beverage made from fermented apple juice.
